channel.title: nato on David Collantes
channel.description: Recent content in nato on David Collantes

item.title: Russia warned over Georgia move
item.description: Russia warned over Georgia move Nato has warned Russia that its recent troop build-up in Georgia’s two breakaway regions undermines its neighbour’s territorial integrity. Would everyone chill out, please? This time Russians, specially. I think a “Back off, and chill” behavior is mandatory.
